<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1916]]''' – [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], out of action since late October, is repatriated and sent to a hospital in [[Birmingham]].
* '''[[2002]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
November: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' is released in the EU for Xbox, PC and Game Boy Advance.

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[2003]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'' is released in North America.
* '''[[2004]]''' - [[David Salo]]'s ''[[A Gateway to Sindarin]]'' is published.
* '''[[2005]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Tactics]]'' is released in North America.
* '''[[2011]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'' is released in Northern Europe.
** [[Tuor]], guided by [[Voronwë]], travels to [[Gondolin]] in order to deliver [[Ulmo]]'s message to [[Turgon]]. They reach the [[Pools of Ivrin]] and see [[Túrin]].
